Instruction: What types of signage services do you offer?
Response: We offer 3D LED signage, vehicle graphics, vinyl stickers, large format printing, and custom acrylic branding.

Instruction: Can you create custom vehicle graphics?
Response: Absolutely! We provide custom wraps and graphics for all types of vehicles.

Instruction: What materials are used for vinyl stickers?
Response: Our vinyl stickers are made from high-quality materials suitable for both indoor and outdoor use.

Instruction: Do you offer large format printing services?
Response: Yes, we offer custom large format printing to bring attention to your brand or product.

Instruction: Can you fabricate custom acrylic stands?
Response: Certainly! We create fabricated acrylic stands tailored for promotional and product displays.

Instruction: What are your business hours?
Response: We are open from Saturday to Thursday, 9:00 am to 6:00 pm.

Instruction: Where are you located?
Response: Our address is Industrial Area 13, Near National Paint, Next to Al Gurg Paints, Sharjah, UAE.

Instruction: How can I contact you?
Response: You can call us at +971 55 995 5339 or email us at maliziasign@gmail.com.

Instruction: Do you have a website?
Response: Yes, our website is www.maliziasign.com.

Instruction: Can I view your gallery online?
Response: Yes, please visit our Gallery page at www.maliziasign.com/Blog.

Instruction: How do I get a quote for a project?
Response: You can contact us via phone, email, or through the contact form on our website to request a quote.

Instruction: Do you assist with signage installation?
Response: Yes, we provide installation services by experienced technicians.

Instruction: What is your experience in the signage industry?
Response: We have over 15 years of experience, having completed more than 25,000 successful projects and manufactured over 1 million signs.

Instruction: Who are some of your clients?
Response: We have served over 750 clients, including multinational organizations such as Coca-Cola, Pepsi, and Unilever.

Instruction: Do you offer signage design services?
Response: Yes, we offer professional signage design services tailored to your brand.

Instruction: Can you help with signboard approvals or permits?
Response: We can guide you on signboard approvals and help ensure compliance with local regulations.

Instruction: What is the turnaround time for a signage project?
Response: Depending on the project scope, it typically takes 3-7 working days. Custom projects may take longer.

Instruction: Can I see samples of your previous work?
Response: Yes, you can view our work in the Gallery section on our website or request a portfolio.

Instruction: Do you offer warranty on your signage products?
Response: Yes, we provide a warranty depending on the material and type of signage. Please contact us for details.

Instruction: What types of businesses do you serve?
Response: We work with retail stores, restaurants, corporate offices, vehicle fleets, and more.

Instruction: Do you provide installation outside Sharjah?
Response: Yes, we serve all Emirates and can accommodate installations beyond Sharjah.

Instruction: Do you offer maintenance services for signage?
Response: Yes, we offer maintenance and repair services for signage and LED displays.

Instruction: Can you produce bilingual signage (Arabic/English)?
Response: Absolutely, we specialize in bilingual and multilingual signage for the UAE market.

Instruction: Do you accept urgent or express orders?
Response: Yes, we offer expedited service for urgent signage needs. Additional charges may apply.

Instruction: What is your pricing structure?
Response: Pricing depends on size, materials, complexity, and quantity. Contact us for a custom quote.

Instruction: Can I schedule an appointment for consultation?
Response: Yes, you can call or email us to schedule a consultation at our office or your location.

Instruction: Is delivery available for signage products?
Response: Yes, we provide delivery services across the UAE. Delivery fees may vary based on location.

Instruction: Do you have customer testimonials?
Response: Yes, our satisfied clients often share testimonials, and weï¿½d be happy to provide them on request.

Instruction: What is the process to place an order?
Response: To place an order, simply contact us through our phone number or email, or fill out the contact form on our website. Our team will guide you through the process.

Instruction: Do you offer custom designs for signage?
Response: Yes, we provide fully custom designs tailored to your brand's needs. Our design team will work closely with you to create the perfect signage.

Instruction: Can I get a digital proof before production?
Response: Yes, we offer digital proofs for approval before starting production to ensure that the design meets your expectations.

Instruction: Are your signage materials weatherproof?
Response: Yes, we use high-quality weatherproof materials suitable for both indoor and outdoor environments, ensuring durability in all conditions.

Instruction: How long does it take to receive a quote?
Response: Typically, we respond with a quote within 1-2 business days after receiving your inquiry and project details.

Instruction: Do you offer eco-friendly signage options?
Response: Yes, we provide eco-friendly signage options made from recyclable materials. Let us know your preferences, and we will help you choose the best solution.

Instruction: Can you help with sign permits for my project?
Response: Yes, we can assist you with obtaining the necessary permits for your signage project, ensuring compliance with local regulations.

Instruction: Do you provide installation for international clients?
Response: We primarily serve the UAE, but we can help coordinate installation services for international clients through our trusted partners.

Instruction: How do I maintain my signage?
Response: We recommend regular cleaning and maintenance to ensure your signage stays in top condition. If repairs are needed, we offer maintenance services to keep your signage functional.

Instruction: Do you offer a satisfaction guarantee?
Response: Yes, we offer a satisfaction guarantee for our signage products. If you're not satisfied with the final product, we will work with you to make it right.
